'''"Kouki" Aralia Mask Rack''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "Kouki" Aralia Mask Rack is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] on [[Tsurumi Island]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest north of the [[Teleport Waypoint]] in [[Moshiri Ceremonial Site]] on Tsurumi Island. This chest does not require completing ''[[A Particularly Particular Author]]'', the first quest in the series ''[[Through the Mists]]''.
